attributes.action: take the life of a murderer who has killed an innocent person in cold blood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If someone kills an innocent person in cold blood they should lose their life too. Bring back the death penalty.

My best friends life was taken on his walk home from innocently enjoing his 19th birthday. He was attacked and killed and all the murderer got was a couple of years of which he served 12 months, out in time to celebrate his birthday. ! this man and his family which were also envolved were set free and protected !!this is sickening this is not justice! Ryan was loved by everyone who met him, never harmed anyone, helped anyone that needed it! What a waste of a beautiful persons life !! What a let down form the Brittish justice system!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
